name: party crasher (KennyGameDev)
description:
Take this present and go to Hell. You've been sent to deliver this present at the party But you've lost the invitation to get in the door  Find a way into the party  THIS GAME CONTAINS PROMINENT FLASHING LIGHTS - A VARIANT WITHOUT FLASHING LIGHTS AND WITH LESS INTENSIVE EFFECTS IS ALSO PROVIDED

MOUSE to look around 

WASD to move 

RIGHT-CLICK to zoom 

SPACE to jump 

ESCAPE to quit 

You LOST your invitation try to FIND another way in
